entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 24.
